verses.content: “Chun, nang, mihriem naupa, Gog chunga chun thu hril rawh, hieng hin ti la, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih: Aw Gog, Ros le, Mesek le, Tubal hotutak nang ka dodâl che a nih;
nang chu i hnung tieng in- nghattir ka ti cheh a, ṭhuoi ka ti cheh a, hmârtieng kilkhâwr tak hmunhaia inthawk chun hung insuoktir ka ti che a, Israel tlânghai chunga chun ṭhuoi ka ti che;
i vawitienga i thalngul chu lâk- pêk ka ti cheh a, i kut changtienga inthawkin i thalhai chu intlâktir ka tih.
Israel tlânghai chunga chun tlûng i ta; nang le i pâwlhai po po le, hnam tamtak nanga kuoma umhai le chun, chun, fâk zo dingin vate chi tin phîngṭâmhai le rama ramsahai kuoma chun pêng ka ti che.
Hmun palailênga chun tlûng i tih, ka hril ta sih a; Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
Magog le thlierkâra chêngtuhai chunga chun mei tir ka ta; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

Chun, ka hming inthieng chu ka mi Israelhai laia chun suklangsâr ka ta, ka hming inthieng sukpawrchea a um ding hrim hrim chu ngai thei naw ningah, chun, hnamhai chun LALPA, Israela Mi Inthieng chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.
Ngai ta, a hung tlung mêk a nih, thaw a ni ngei ding a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih; hi hi a nih ni ka ihril chu.

Chun, chuong Israel khawpui- haia chêngtuhai chu fe suok an ta, hriemhrei meihai chu siem an ta, râwng an tih; âwmphaw le phawhai dâm, thalngul le thalhai dâm, hmawl- funghai dâm, feihai dâm, râwng an ta, chun, chuonghai chun kum sari sûng mei chu tîng an tih;

chuongchun, rama inthawkin thing la naw ni hai a, rampui hnuoia inthawkin pakhat khawm phûr bawk naw ni hai; hriemhreihaiin mei an ti ding a ni sih a; anni suksetuhai chu suksieng an ta, anni inruhmangtuhai chu inruhmang an tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

“Chun, chu nia chun, Israela chun, tuisuoriet saktieng panga fethlengtuhai phairuom chu Gog ta ding chun inphûmna hmun dingin pêng ka ta; chutaka chun Gog le a mihai po po chu phûm an tih; chun, anni chun ‘Hamon-gog Phairuom’ ti nghe nghêng an tih.
Chun, ram chu an sukthieng theina dingin Israel sûngkuohai chun anni chu thla sari sûng phûm an ta.
Anih, chu rama mihai po po chun phûm an ta, chawimawia ka um nia chun anni ta ding chun hriet zing tlâk nîng a tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
Chun, ram chu sukfai dinga ram fang suok a, ruong phûm loa umhai phûm dinga sina nei ding mi ruot hran an ta, anni chun thla sari tâwpah zawng ṭan an tih.
Chun, chuong ram fangtuhai chun fang an ta, mi tukhawma mi- hriem ru a hmu chun, a sira chun inchikna târ a ta, a phûmtuhaiin Harmon-gog phairuoma an phûm hmakhat chun.
(Chutaka chun khawpui a hming Hamona khawm a um bawk a.) Chuong ang chun ram chu suk- thieng an tih.

“Chun, nang mihriem naupa, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; ramhnuoia sa tinrêng le, vate chi tinrênghai kuoma chun thu hril la, hieng hin hril rawh: Hung inkhâwm unla, hung ro, sa chu in fâka thisen chu in dâwn theina dingin Israel tlâng chunghaia inthâwina ropui- tak, in ta dinga kân thâwina, kân thâwina sîr tina inthawkin hung inkhâwm ro.
Mi thilthawtheihai sa chu fâng in ta; hnuoia lalhai le, berâmchalhai le, berâmtehai le, kêlhai le, bâwng- chalhai, Basan rama châwmthâuhai po po thisen chu dâwn in tih.
In ta dinga kân thâwina thâu chu in khawp hmakhat fâng in ta, thisen chu in inrui hmakhat dâwn bawk in tih.
Chun, ka dâwkâna chun sa- kawrhai, sakawr tawlailîrhai, mi thilthawtheitakhai le indo mihai po po chun sukkhawpin um in tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.
Chun, ka ropuina chu hnamhai laia chun sieng ka ta, chuongchun, hnam po pohai chun rorêlna ka suk- tlung ta le, an chunga ka kut kân nghat chu hmûng an tih.
Chun, chu nia inthawka a hnungtieng chen chun Israel sûngkuo chun LALPA an Pathien ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.

Chun, hnamhai chun Israel sûngkuo chu an suol leia sala intâng an nih ti hrieng an ta; ka chungah an lo bawsiet tah a, kei khawma ka hmai ka thuppêk bawk leiin; chuongchun, an hmêlmahai kutah anni chu ka pêk a, an rêng el chun kâwlhnâma chun an lo tlu tah a.
An inthieng nawna ang pei le, an bawisietnahai ang peiin an chunga chun ka lo thaw tah a; chun, ka hmai chu ka thuppêk bawk a.

“Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Tuhin Jakob sal intângna chu hung la kîr ka ta; Israel sûngkuo pumpui ta ding chun zângaina nei ka tih; chun, ka hming inthieng khawm humhal bawk ka tih.
An rama chun himtakin an chêng a, tukhawma anni chu an sukṭi naw pha chun, an inzakna, an baw- sietnahai po po, ka chunga an lo bawsietnahai chu phur an tih;
hnamhai laia inthawka anni ka hung ṭhuoi kîr nâwk a, an hmêlmahai rama inthawka anni ka kei khâwma, hnam tamtakhai mithmua annia chawimawia ka um pha chun.

Chun, hnamhai laia sala intâng dinga kân fetir a, anni rama ngei chun ka ṭhuoi khâwm nâwka hin, LALPA an Pathien chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an ta; chutaka chun anni chu tukhawm mâksan nâwk ta naw ningah,
annia inthawk chun ka hmai chu thuppêk ta bawk naw ning a; Israel sûngkaw chunga chun ka thla- rau ka buok ta sih a, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.
